testcase.name: Verify "Go1Percent" logo, carousel images, carousel caption and the footer message
Verify that tag line with text "Get 1% Better Everyday" is displayed
Verify that carousel image changes while clicking on carousel button
Verify that login page heading contains text "Sign in to Go 1%" is displayed
Verify that clicking on the Microsoft logo redirects to the Microsoft login page
Verify that specific text between login options is present on the web page
Verify clicking on the "Terms of Use" link opens a new page with the terms of use
Verify clicking on the "privacy Policy" link opens a new page with the terms of use
Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and an alert message is displayed
Verify remember me checkbox is selected during login
Verify that login fails with credentials and an alert message is displayed
